entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WNW 34 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
